reviewText:
Long-lost Paramount musical shorts take us back for a look at rising young stars of the 1920s and 1930s. Included are Lorenz Hart and Richard Rodgers, Ginger Rogers, Rudy Vallee, Duke Ellington, Bing Crosby,Ethel Merman, Cab Calloway and many others in musical performances. Also Bessie Smith, Fats Waller and Hoagie Carmichael.  Takes us from the earliest days of sound through the 1940s. A little hokey in the Hollywood musical tradition, but material is priceless!
You will need a laserdisc player. as these are NOT Dvds.
